City Roof Top Terrace - Edinburgh

Featured large planters to compliment old and new buildings Lower terrace – planted with a selections of grasses, shrubs and trees that can cope with the windy location Upper Terrace – mix of grasses and perennials for bright airy feel with yellows, terracotta’s and red

“We absolutely love both designs, they were exactly what we wanted… mix of containers and colours looks fantastic”
